relation: Since it is a small school everyone knows each other, which makes attending events such as Football Games, Pep Rally, and Homecoming worthwhile.
Food is typical but does have healthy choices for the health conscious.
I do not dorm but from what I heard dorm rooms are very clean, and provides a fun and friendly atmosphere.
Long Island University has an awesome welcoming atmosphere. From the outstanding faculty to the diverse student body C.W Post has something to offer for everyone.
pageTitle: LIU Post - Long Island University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {137130=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 40387=LIU Post is an exquisite school equipped with a full recreational center, gourmet food, and a club for everybody. Like all schools the work is diifficult but there are upperclass tutors and teachers available to assist in any problems you may have. I cannot wait to begin in September., 32911=One good thing is that there is this mandatory break time; it's from 12:30-1:50. It's called Common Hour and during this time there are no classes so you get to hang out with friends, meet with professors if you have questions regarding your paper, join clubs, study notes for next class, etc.}

textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Aisha from Norwalk, CT 08/04/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 3 out of 4 people found this review useful. 2 of 32 Categories Comments Am enjoying being here I think what makes post enjoyable is if you are studying something that you like. I am a dance major at the school and I love the experience that I am getting. Along with all the great people I meet, I am able to further my knowledge in something I love doing. The campus is also an ideal size for me as well as the location. If you're looking for a smaller campus with a homey feel then post is for you.
